name: n3-lang-exec
description: Language and in-editor reasoning features for N3 code.
author: w3c.n3

n3Execute.reasoner.description: Choose the N3 reasoner to execute N3 code

n3Execute.jen3Path.description: Path to the jen3 JAR file (download at https://github.com/william-vw/jen3/releases)

n3Execute.onlyShowInferences.description: Only show inferences and not the full deductive closure

n3Execute.prettyPrintEyeOutput.description:
Pretty-print the eye output using python rdflib.
*** Requires python3 to be installed on your system ***
*** Does not support full n3 expressivity (e.g., lists as subjects) ***

n3Execute.extraEyeArguments.description: Provide additional command line arguments to eye.

n3LspServer.namespacesFile.description:
Path to a JSON file with a single object that maps prefixes to their namepace URIs.
*** Restart extension to load new namespaces ***
*** See https://github.com/william-vw/vscode-extension-n3/blob/main/namespaces.json for an example ***

n3LspServer.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

n3LspServer.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
